upcomingEvents.title: G12 Encounter Weekend
upcomingEvents.description: Forty-eight hours of worship, deliverance, and restoration designed to lead every participant into a fresh encounter with Jesus.

upcomingEvents.title: School of Leaders Intensive
upcomingEvents.description: A one-night intensive that jump-starts the next School of Leaders track with vision casting, teaching, and enrollment.

upcomingEvents.title: Community Food Drive
upcomingEvents.description: Cells adopt blocks to deliver groceries, pray for families, and invite neighbors into the G12 process.
